Articles.Content:
hi, welcome to my first tutorial, i will help you change your kerbals name. firstly, go to the persistence file in your ksp folder so: ksp/saves/default/persistent.sfs ow search for your currently existing kerbals name by pressing f3, then change it to whatever you want, from there you can also make him/her \'s actions (like making them braver than jeb, or constantly scared)

next save that, then got to quicksave.sfs wich is in the same folder as persistent.sfs and do EXACTLY the same things to your kerbal, congradulations your kerbal now has a new name!
